title: Universities of Australia
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Geoffrey Bell and Malcolm Otton
brief_description: An account of the growth of Australia’s universities and a survey of their contribution to our national life. The technological contribution to the nation, based on the scientific work of the universities, is stressed and the need for additional and continued support for the institutions is emphasised.
